meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be upgraded.
meanings.sent1: Her computer's upgradeabilities allowed for faster processing speeds.
meanings.sent2: The upgradeabilities of the software made it easy to add new features.
meanings.sent3: The robot's upgradeabilities were put to the test when it had to learn a new task overnight.
meanings.sent4: The upgradeabilities of the car were like giving it a turbo boost.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeabilities of the phone were so impressive that it felt like getting a brand new device.

meanings.definition: The potential for improvement or advancement through upgrades.
meanings.sent1: The company's success was due to the upgradeabilities of its products.
meanings.sent2: With the right upgrades, the system's upgradeabilities were endless.
meanings.sent3: The team's upgradeabilities were put to the test when they had to solve a complex problem.
meanings.sent4: Her upgradeabilities in coding were like unlocking a new level of expertise.
meanings.sent5: The upgradeabilities of the building were evident in its ability to adapt to changing needs.
